sentence: 1. I used to cry when my dad chopped onions. i miss onions, he was a good dog.
2. Why cant indiana jones find a long lasting relationship? bad dates.
3. Why do bakers start working so early in the morning? because they knead dough.
4. What country does fried fish swim in? greece! (courtesy of my ten year old)
5. What did one tampon say to the other? nothing, they were both stuck up bitches.

i used to cry when my dad chopped onions. i miss onions, he was a good dog.
explanation: Refers to the vegetable that causes tears when chopped and also a term of endearment for a pet.
first_new_sentence: Onions contain sulfur compounds that can irritate the eyes and cause tears.
second_new_sentence: I miss onions as a beloved pet name for my dog.

sentence: Why cant indiana jones find a long lasting relationship? bad dates.
explanation: Refers to the fruit as well as romantic outings.

second_new_sentence: The dates I had last week were just not compatible.

sentence: Why do bakers start working so early in the morning? because they knead dough.
explanation: Refers to the action of working with dough and also implies a need for something.
first_new_sentence: Bakers need to knead dough to prepare baked goods.

sentence: What country does fried fish swim in? greece!
explanation: Refers to the country and alludes to cooking with grease.

sentence: What did one tampon say to the other? nothing, they were both stuck up bitches.
